Deep learning is a subset of machine learning, which itself is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI). It involves the use of artificial neural networks with many layers—hence the term "deep"—to model and understand complex patterns and relationships in data. Here's a more detailed breakdown of what deep learning entails:
